TopicTitle: Which month do you think KSP Version 1.0 will be released?

Articles.Content:
..........

Edited February 2, 2015 by Gus
December 2016, after a few more critical updates that haven't happened.
I'm thinking it will be a month that has a vowel in it. But that's just a guess.
I think some time after the Apple Watch.
When Half-Life 3 is released.

Let's see. I'd say 0.91 in May. 0.92 in July. 0.93 in September. 1.0 in October.

Yeah. That sounds good. Get all the pieces in place for 0.91. A few balance and bug patches and onward and upward to 1.0!

Feb 14

Mark my words
I hope it isn't that soon. I love KSP updates as much as the next person, but I'd like some time to finish my Jool mission before I have to start over xP

I'm feeling incredibly optimistic.

October.....2017. Followed by emergency patches through to mid 2018.

I hope it isn't that soon. I love KSP updates as much as the next person, but I'd like some time to finish my Jool mission before I have to start over xP

Just do finish it?

It seemed as if they really wanted to get out of early access - so February/March seems a good guess.
IIRC, one of the devs said this would be a long one, compared to past updates. I'm guessing at least August, if not later.

When Half-Life 3 is released.

Is it sad that I'm getting nostalgic for the time when Duke Nuken Forever was the one getting picked on?
I guess March, that's when my birthday is.

Is it sad that I'm getting nostalgic for the time when Duke Nuken Forever was the one getting picked on?
I thought the wait for Mechwarrior 2 was bad...
Next month. Always next month.
Most likely somewhere between February 2015 and January 2050! I think this is a pretty correct prediction, so as to say
I'm going to go with April, so that they can mess up everyone's final exams for the second time in a row.
I'm going to guess that it will be released in the month in which it is ready to be released.

I'm going to go with April, so that they can mess up everyone's final exams for the second time in a row.

Yes! I bet they will do this again!
At the rate at which they are at right now, and what they've said about the development so far, I'd say sometime around late April-early May would be my guess.
Before the end of the month, to the uproar of the community.
Probably late spring. I voted later than June though being hopeful they would change their minds.

As long as it takes. Once they go out of Early Access things get serious and the professional reviewers will start scrutinizing more heavily. The game needs to be polished to a shine to get the best reviews possible (and thus encourage fresh new players to buy the game).

Hmm.. let me do a guesstimation..

A couple of years ago, updates came out every month (sometimes 2 months), then they did a big update (must be around 0.20) where they reorganized the pipeline so updates would come out sooner. After this updates came out around every 3 months..

So now they say the game is almost finished, i guess next update (1.0) should come out 3-4 months after the last update (0.90), witch would mean somewhere around April/May(Lets hope i am very wrong)

The Dawn space probe comes into orbit of the dwarf planet Ceres, in March. (Though the pictures won't be at their best, until later in the year.) A real-space news "coincidental release" might be good for KSP. Nonetheless, April seems more likely, given Maxmaps' squadcast comments.
